content.subject_line: Don't Miss The Chance to Reserve Your Spot To Our 9/20 4-Course Duckhorn Wine Dinner
content.headline: HARVEST SEASON WINE DINNER FEATURING A COLLECTION FROM BUCKHORN VINEYARDS
content.body_copy: Join us for an evening of perfect pairings, featuring select varietals from Duckhorn Vineyards, one of North America's premier producers of Napa Valley wines, each thoughtfully paired with the delightful Fall flavors of Bonefish. Come experience the exceptional character and quality of Duckhorn wines and seasonal favorites, only at Bonefish Grill.

content.subject_line: Today Is Your Last Chance For Snow Crabs!
content.preheader_text: Enjoy A Full Pound For Only $24.9
content.headline: LAST DAY TO ENJOY SNOW CRAB LEGS FOR ONLY $26.9
content.body_copy: JOIN US TONIGHT AND DON'T MISS THESE! AVAILABLE THROUGH 9/4. Indulge in a full pound of succulent snow crab legs and your choice of two signature sides for only $26.9 or add a half pound to any entrée for only $11.9. Hurry in, because tomorrow they'll be gone!

content.subject_line: A Heartfelt Thank You To Our Veterans
content.headline: THIS VETERANS DAY ENJOY A COMPLIMENTARY BANG BANG SHRIMP®
content.body_copy: This Veteran's Day we invite all veterans and active duty military to enjoy a complimentary Bang Bang Shrimp® Appetizer and a Coca-Cola or non-alcoholic beverage while dining in.

content.subject_line: Open To See How You Can Get $50 Off Your Holiday Catering Order
content.preheader_text: Let Us Take Care Of Your Holiday Cooking!
content.headline: LET US CATER FOR THE HOLIDAYS RECEIVE $50 OFF YOUR CATERING ORDER
content.body_copy: Order catering Nov. 13 - Nov. 27 and receive $50 off with a minimum purchase of $250 for events through Dec. 31. We offer starters, land & sea entrées, tacos, individually packaged entrées, salads, sides, desserts and beverages for your crew. Impress your guests with catering from Bonefish Grill!

content.subject_line: It's Cyber Monday AND The Winter White Cosmo is back!
content.preheader_text: Get Your Holiday Shopping Done While Sipping A $7 Winter White Cosmo Today!
content.headline: CYBER MONDAY GIFT CARD OFFER
content.body_copy: Cyber Monday with each $25 you buy you get $5, online only; one day only! Buy $25, get $5 bonus card. Buy $75, get $15 bonus card. Buy $100, get $20 bonus card.

content.subject_line: Discover The Place To Brunch With Your Crew!
content.preheader_text: Our Meal For Two, Ends Today!
content.headline: BRUNCH WITH SHAREABLE PITCHERS
content.body_copy: Bring your crew to Brunch and raise a glass with one of our shareable pitchers. Choose between Blackberry Red Sangria, Sparkling Mango White Sangria or Parker's Margarita. Each serves 3.

content.headline: 3-COURSE MEAL FOR TWO CHOOSE FROM 8 ENTRÉES $45.9
content.body_copy: Your Dine & Discover Sharing For Two dinner includes your choice of two premium sides. Enjoy sides that compliment your entrée selections like Creamy Parmesan Risotto, Kung Pao Brussels Sprouts, Bacon Mac & Cheese and more!

content.preheader_text: Only Available Saturday So Don't Miss It!
content.headline: ENJOY $7 MARTINIS TODAY ONLY
content.body_copy: Why should Mondays have all of the fun? Enjoy $7 Martinis all day today, 11/18. Enjoy a Martini Monday this Saturday, November 18th. Enjoy your favorite Bonefish martini for just $7, one day only. See you Saturday!

content.subject_line: Treat Yourself To Martini Monday. All Martini's Are Only $7
content.preheader_text: Halloween Is Right Around The Corner, So Treat Yourself!
content.headline: DON'T MISS MARTINI MONDAYS! AVAILABLE FOR A LIMITED TIME!
content.body_copy: We've brought back our popular Martini Mondays where every Monday for a limited time you can enjoy our seasonal Pumpkin Espresso Martini for only $7!

content.subject_line: Are you ready for the big game?
content.headline: GET READY FOR THE BIG GAME! WHO DOESN'T LOVE BANG BANG?
content.body_copy: The BIG BANG PLATTER is the perfect addition to your gameday spread. Order today with your choice of Shrimp or Chicken to be the MVP of the party!

content.subject_line: Gift Or Buy A Gift Card Over The Holidays?
content.headline: WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?
content.body_copy: Do you have any Bonefish Grill gift cards or Bonus cards from the holidays? Redeem them starting today until 3/31!
